 requires credit passes in English Language, 
Economics, Government and a pass in  
Mathematics.  
e) FEDPO-NEK accepts one (1) of the following 
Statistics, CRS, Information Communication 
Technology and any one (1) of Science subjects.  
f) KWAPOLY requires ‘O’ level credit pass in one 
Basic Science subject as course requirement. It 
also accepts a credit pass in History.  
g) CABSP accepts Certificate Course of the College 
or from any recognised institution OR any other 
qualification recognized by the College Academic 
Board.  
h) FEDPO-AIU requires ‘O’ level credit passes in 
Commerce, Accounts, Geography, Mathematics, 
Statistics, CRS/IS and accepts a pass in 
Mathematics.  
i) FEDPO-BAU requires English Language, History, 
Government, and any two (2) of History, 
Economics, IS/CRS.  
j) IMO-POLY accepts only Biology or Agricultural 
Science. It does not accept History and Literature 
in English as course requirement for Public 
Administration.  
k) FIDEIPOLY requires five (5) credit passes in 
English Language, Economics, Government, 
Geography, Statis tics, Accounts, Commerce, 
Economics, CRS, Information Communication 
Technology and History. ‘O’ level in Mathematics 
is accepted.   
l) OKE-OGUN POLY requires credit passes in 
English Language, Economics, Government and a 
pass in Mathematics.  
m) SURE-POLY requir es five (5) 'O' level credit 
passes in English Language, Economics, 
Mathematics, Government and any other subject 
at not more than two (2) sittings.  
  
  
UTME SUBJECTS
